## Biography

Teddy Tun Win Hla is a specialist trainee in intensive care medicine at [London Deanery](https://www.lpmde.ac.uk/) with an interest in respiratory failure and mechanical ventilation. He is an honorary research assitant at [UCL Institue for Health Informatics](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/health-informatics/ucl-institute-health-informatics)

Through the use of quantitative analysis,mathematical modelling, and data visualisation, he aims to enhance patient care at bed-side, particularly in dynamic and complex physiological systems such as in critically unwell patients.

His current work includes real-time data visualisation and analysis of lung mechanics for critically unwell patients.
